name: (Beta) ROBOX, Citizen Walk [ENG.]
description:
Welcome to this great adventure, where there is no lack of mini-games and the fun never ends! Are you ready? Then go ahead! This is my first project, and I hope it won't be my last! The game is still in development, but no doubt it will be ready in a jiffy!

P.S: Credits to AlphaDream company for the "Come On!" combat music, which was used for the training music in the tutorial. Also to MuchoPixels, for their Tileset Pack.
